name: Temi
greetingText: Love your stitching style and your energy! Abeg, you dey burst my brain!

text2: I bin wan just send message o.
text3: But then, I say, 'no be so o!'
text4: I had to make something wey
text5Content: You're the Dray of Sunshine. Dammy Snr's Mummy, Oga madam!
wishHeading: Happy Birthday, Dray! We dey gbosa for you!
outroText: Hope this small thing wey I do, e sweet you sha!
replayText: Trust me, you've got a lovely kid bro, na why I dey run faster for this ðŸ˜‰
